description: Selva Nevada is a company dedicated to conserving Colombian biodiversity while fostering prosperity in local communities. By producing food products from native fruits, harvested and processed by small producers, Selva Nevada promotes sustainable agricultural practices that support forest conservation. With a focus on creating healthy products for consumers, the initiative aims to balance health for individuals, society, and the environment, ultimately enhancing the livelihoods of rural communities across Colombia.
name: Selva Nevada
